893340.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rappan Athuk Bestiary (PFRPG)
893340.description:
Rappan Athuk Bestiary

All the monsters presented in the Monster Appendices have gotten their own lairs write-up.
Now you can unleash these beasts in your campaign anywhere, not just in the World's Deadliest Dungeon!
This product includes:
  • Over 25 premade encounters
  • Over 40 NPCs and monsters
  • Over 35 Story entries describing locations, encounters, and lairs of these beasts
  • 5 premade parcels for items in the possession of these creatures
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Gregory Salito
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
